statements: UPDATE driver_behavior SET driving_speed = 60, acceleration = 0.5 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE driver_behavior SET hard_braking = FALSE, acceleration = 0.8 WHERE driver_id = 102;
UPDATE driver_behavior SET driving_speed = 80, acceleration = 0.5, hard_braking = FALSE WHERE driver_id = 123
UPDATE driver_behavior SET hard_braking = TRUE, acceleration = 0.3, driving_speed = 65 WHERE driver_id = 456
UPDATE driver_behavior SET speeding_events = 10, harsh_braking_events = 5 WHERE driver_id = 12345;
UPDATE safety_metrics SET airbag_deployments = 2, seatbelt_usage = true WHERE driver_id = 54321;
UPDATE driver_behavior SET harsh_acceleration_events = 5, speeding_events = speeding_events + 1 WHERE driver_id = 12345;
UPDATE safety_metrics SET seatbelt_usage = true, airbag_deployments = airbag_deployments + 1 WHERE driver_id = 54321;
UPDATE driver_data SET driver_age = 30 WHERE driver_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE safety_metrics SET accident_count = 2, safe_driving_score = 90 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE driver_data SET driver_age = 40, license_plate = 'ABC123' WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE safety_metrics SET safe_driving_score = 90, accident_count = 2 WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE driver_metrics SET total_distance = total_distance + 50 WHERE driver_id = 101;
UPDATE safety_metrics SET total_accidents = 2, safety_rating = 4.5 WHERE driver_id = 203;
UPDATE driver_metrics SET average_speed = 65.5, total_trips = total_trips + 1 WHERE driver_id = 123;
UPDATE trip_data SET trip_distance = 25.3, start_location = 'City A', end_location = 'City B' WHERE trip_id = 456;
UPDATE driver_info SET address='123 Main St', phone_number='555-1234' WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE trip_info SET trip_distance=150.5, end_location='Destination B' WHERE trip_id = 3;
UPDATE driver_info SET driver_name = 'John Doe', driver_license = 'ABC12345' WHERE driver_id = 1;
UPDATE driving_behavior SET reckless_driving = true, distracted_driving = false WHERE driver_id = 3;
